name: Let's escape
description:
This is my first game posted and it's a prototype (really simple game), so please, consider as beginner game design.

Introduction of the game:

You just woke up in a bathroom in an unknown house and aim to escape from it to save your life!

However, there are several puzzles and your objective is to solve all the mysteries hidden in the rooms and escape.

Information:

Controls - left mouse button and ESC.

Please be free to comments below. 

The design chosen was low poly.

Instalation instruction:

Unzip de file and click on the file Escape Room Low Poly for Play.
